misjudge.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to form a wrong or unfair opinion about a person or a situation
misjudge.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The government misjudged the mood of the electorate.
misjudge.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to guess an amount or distance wrongly
misjudge.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I misjudged the speed of the car coming towards me.
